summary: Goth is a unique youth culture that started in the UK in the 1980s, inspired by gothic rock music. It's still popular today and has spread worldwide. Goths love dark fashion, often wearing black clothes, heavy makeup, and having dark hair. They're into music like gothic rock and death rock, and they draw ideas from old horror movies and Gothic stories. You can find goths at music festivals and nightclubs, especially in Western Europe.
title: Goth subculture
